course learning objectives: The main objective of the course is to:n1. Understand the advanced concepts in power systems by performing various experiments and tests in the laboratory.nList of Experimentsn- Differential protection scheme for transformers for different types of faultsn- Plot the characteristics of differential protection relayn- Under/over frequency relay operationn- Over current and earth fault protection using IDMT/DMT relayn- Cable fault location using cable fault locator
course outcomes: After the completion of the course the student will be able to,n- Explain the relay operationn- Understand the operation of protection devices.
